external_games.name: Sakatsuku2002: J.League Pro Soccer Club wo Tsukurou!

name: Sakatsuku2002: J.League Pro Soccer Club wo Tsukurou!
summary: The "Sakatsuku" series is a soccer club management simulation game released by Sega. At SakaTsuku 2002, we will become the all-powerful representative of a new J2 team, aiming to build a team that can compete with the J League and club teams around the world.
